Class CatalinaConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.onehippo.forge.hipshoot.spring.boot.support.config.embedded.CatalinaConfiguration

  • @Component
 @ConfigurationProperties(prefix="hipshoot.embedded.catalina")
public class CatalinaConfiguration
extends Object
    Configuration properties for AppsDeployingTomcatEmbeddedServletContainerFactory.
